entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning late this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15 with temperature falling to minus 21 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 31.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 31. Wind chill minus 36 in the evening and minus 43 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 8:37 PM EST Sunday 22 January 2023
